Article Title: Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg visits White House for second meeting with Donald Trump since taking office
Article Text:
Mark Zuckerberg's second meet after Donald Trump assumed office

Facebook-parent Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg visited the White House on Wednesday for meetings with Trump administration officials, Reuters reported. “Mark’s continuing the meetings he's been holding with the administration on American technology leadership,” Meta spokesman Andy Stone told the news agency, though he did not confirm the White House visit.Zuckerberg’s meeting comes just weeks after he made headlines for showcasing Meta’s advancements in artificial intelligence and the metaverse . Last month, the Facebook founder demonstrated the latest AI-powered features integrated into Meta’s platforms, emphasizing the company’s commitment to staying at the forefront of technological innovation.The social media giant is reportedly testing its first internally developed chip designed for training artificial intelligence (AI) systems. Meta is partnering with Taiwan-based TSMC to manufacture the chip. Testing began after Meta completed its first “tape-out” - a critical phase in chip development that involves sending an initial design through a chip factory.This development holds much significance as the company joins other tech giants like Google, Microsoft, Amazon and ChatGPT-maker OpenAI to create custom silicon and decrease dependence on external suppliers such as Nvidia.This is Zuckerberg’s second visit to the White House in two months. Last month, he met with officials to discuss Meta’s role in advancing U.S. technological leadership. Stone had then confirmed the February 6 visit, stating on X:“Mark Zuckerberg was at the White House today to discuss how Meta can help the administration defend and advance American tech leadership abroad.”Zuckerberg has been actively engaging with policymakers on AI regulations, digital infrastructure, and the role of U.S. tech firms in global competition. His interactions with the administration have also included two reported meetings with Trump at Mar-a-Lago before he took office.
Article Summary: Mark Zuckerberg visited the White House on Wednesday for meetings with Trump administration officials, Reuters reported. Last month, he met with officials to discuss Meta’s role in advancing U.S. technological leadership. The social media giant is reportedly testing its first internally developed chip designed for training artificial intelligence (AI) systems. Meta is partnering with Taiwan- based TSMC to manufacture the chip.

Article Title: UK Regulator: Apple and Google are the reason why innovation in mobile browsers is not working
Article Text:
Representative image

Apple responds to the UK’s CMA, “We have concerns with this report”



The United Kingdom's competition watchdog has concluded that Apple and Google are stifling innovation in the mobile browser market, with Apple's policies bearing most of the blame according to a final report published Wednesday.The Competition and Markets Authority's (CMA) independent inquiry group found that the mobile browser market is "not working well for consumers and businesses," identifying several anti-competitive practices by both tech giants that limit competition and potentially restrict economic growth."Following our in-depth investigation, we have concluded that competition between different mobile browsers is not working well, and this is holding back innovation in the UK," said Margot Daly, Chair of the CMA's independent inquiry group.The investigation highlighted specific concerns about Apple's policies, including requiring all iOS browsers to use its WebKit browser engine, giving Safari preferential access to features compared to competing browsers, imposing limitations on in-app browsing, and pre-installing Safari as the default browser on iPhones For Google, investigators flagged Chrome's position as the pre-installed default browser on most Android devices and revenue sharing arrangements with Apple. The report noted that Google pays Apple "a significant share of search revenue" in exchange for being the default search engine on iPhones, which investigators say is "significantly reducing their financial incentives to compete."The duopoly's market dominance is striking, with Safari accounting for 88% of browsers on Apple devices and Chrome representing 77% on Android devices in 2024.In response, Apple defended its position: "Apple believes in thriving and dynamic markets where innovation can flourish. We face competition in every segment and jurisdiction where we operate, and our focus is always the trust of our users. We have concerns with this report and believe the remedies it discusses would undermine privacy, security, and the overall user experience."While the report suggests potential remedies—including forcing Apple to allow alternative browser engines on iOS and requiring both companies to offer browser choice screens during device setup—no immediate enforcement actions will be taken.Instead, the CMA has launched separate investigations into both companies to determine if they have "strategic market status" under the Digital Markets, Competition and Consumers Act. If designated with such status, Apple and Google could face stricter antitrust requirements and potential fines of up to 10% of annual turnover for violations.These investigations are expected to conclude later this year.
Article Summary: UK's competition watchdog concludes Apple and Google stifling innovation in mobile browser market. Apple's policies bearing most of the blame according to final report published Wednesday. Apple responds to the UK’s CMA, “We have concerns with this report”

Article Title: FBI warning to iPhone and Android phone users: Delete these text messages Right Away
Article Text:
How these text message scams work

Two biggest dangers of text message scams

The 'China-link' in text message scams

Most-affected states in America

FBI's to-do and not-to-do list for Americans

The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) has sounded the alarm across the United States, warning of a rapidly spreading wave of "smishing" attacks aimed at deceiving iPhone and Android users into surrendering sensitive personal and financial information. The term "smishing," a blend of "SMS" and "phishing," refers to fraudulent text messages designed to trick recipients into revealing passwords, credit card numbers, and other confidential data. Authorities report that cybercriminals have registered over 10,000 domains to power these scams, which have surged fourfold since January 2025.According to a new report from Unit 42, the threat intelligence arm of cybersecurity firm Palo Alto Networks , these scams have evolved from fake toll payment notifications to include counterfeit delivery service alerts. The fraudulent messages often lure victims into clicking malicious links or entering payment details on bogus websites. "What started as a toll scam has grown into a sophisticated operation targeting unsuspecting Americans with fake alerts about unpaid bills or undelivered packages," said a Unit 42 spokesperson.The smishing campaign initially gained traction by claiming recipients owed unpaid toll fees, a tactic that state and local authorities have been combating for months. According to a report in New York Post, in one case uncovered by in Detroit, victims attempting to pay the fabricated tolls encountered error messages stating their cards were declined—further delaying detection of the scam. More recently, the fraud has expanded to mimic trusted delivery services like FedEx and DHL, urging users to click links to "track" nonexistent packages.The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has cautioned that these malicious links pose a dual threat: Financial theft and identity fraud. "Clicking a link might seem harmless, but it can open the door to devastating consequences," an FTC official warned. Many of the scam texts follow a predictable pattern, alleging an urgent unpaid bill and directing users to a payment portal hosted on one of the scammers’ sprawling network of domains. To evade Apple’s iMessage safeguards, which block suspicious links, fraudsters now instruct users to manually copy and paste URLs into their browsers—a subtle but effective workaround.Cybersecurity experts suspect the operation functions as a "franchise model," with toolkits likely sourced from Chinese cybercriminal groups. Unit 42 identified several malicious domains using China’s .XIN top-level domain, including:* dhl.com-new[.]xin* fedex.com-fedexl[.]xin* sunpass.com-ticketap[.]xin."Legitimate U.S. toll services and delivery companies would never use foreign domains like these," the FTC said.The hardest-hit cities in the US include Dallas, Atlanta, Los Angeles, Chicago, and Orlando, according to a McAfee report, with Miami, Houston, Denver, Phoenix, and Seattle also ranking high on the list of targeted areas.As the scams proliferate, the FBI is urging the public to remain vigilant and take immediate action if they receive a suspicious text. Recommended steps include filing a complaint with the Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3) at http://www.ic3.gov, verifying payments directly with official toll or delivery service websites, and deleting smishing messages without engaging.For those who may have already shared personal or financial information, the FBI advises securing accounts and disputing unauthorized transactions without delay. "These scams are relentless, but awareness and quick action can stop them in their tracks," an FBI spokesperson said.
Article Summary: "Smishing" texts are designed to trick recipients into revealing passwords, credit card numbers, and other confidential data. Authorities report that cybercriminals have registered over 10,000 domains to power these scams. The hardest-hit cities in the US include Dallas, Atlanta, Los Angeles, Chicago, and Orlando.

Article Title: Google launches two new Gemini AI models, and they will make Robots 'See, Think, and Act' in real-time
Article Text:
Google CEO Sundar Pichai on 'AI for Robots'

Google 'wants' intelligent robot to deal with messiness

The highs and lows of Google's robotics journey

Google: Robotics AI still in 'early phase'

Alphabet Inc’s research division, Google DeepMind , announced the launch of two groundbreaking artificial intelligence models aimed at transforming the robotics industry. The new models, Gemini Robotics and Gemini Robotics-ER, are designed to tackle a persistent challenge in robotics: Enabling machines to adapt to unpredictable, real-world scenarios. Gemini Robotics, an offshoot of Google’s flagship Gemini AI model, focuses on enhancing robots’ dexterity and interactivity. Meanwhile, Gemini Robotics-ER emphasizes spatial reasoning, offering developers advanced tools to create robots capable of navigating complex environments using Gemini’s powerful reasoning abilities.Introducing the AI models, Google CEO Sundar Pichai wrote on Twitter, "We’ve always thought of robotics as a helpful testing ground for translating AI advances into the physical world. Today we’re taking our next step in this journey with our newest Gemini 2.0 robotics models. They show state of the art performance on two important benchmarks - generalization and embodied reasoning - which enable robots to draw from Gemini’s multimodal understanding of the world to make changes on the fly + adapt to their surroundings. This milestone lays the foundation for the next generation of robotics that can be helpful across a range of applications."According to a report by Bloomberg, DeepMind engineer Kanishka Rao said that these advancements bring Google closer to realizing “general purpose robotics” — machines versatile enough to handle a wide range of tasks. “Our worlds are super messy and dynamic and rich,” Rao reportedly said during a media briefing. “A general purpose intelligent robot needs to be able to deal with that messiness.”The announcement comes amid a resurgence of interest in robotics across Silicon Valley, with heavyweights like Meta Platforms Inc, Tesla Inc, and OpenAI intensifying their efforts, and startups securing massive funding rounds. Google’s latest push builds on this momentum, showcasing its technology in a pre-taped demonstration.Google’s robotics journey has seen its ups and downs over the years. Over a decade ago, the company acquired eight robotics firms to pursue co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin’s vision of consumer-friendly robots powered by machine learning. Those efforts eventually shifted to Google X, Alphabet’s moonshot lab, and spawned Everyday Robots in 2021, a unit focused on mundane tasks like trash sorting. However, Alphabet shuttered Everyday Robots in 2023 amid widespread budget cuts, though it vowed to integrate the technology into ongoing robotics projects. Now, with generative AI at the forefront, Google appears to be reinvigorating its ambitions.The new models remain in an “early exploration” phase, according to DeepMind research scientist Vikas Sindhwani. Safety is a priority, with the Gemini models built to exhibit “common sense safety” in physical settings. Google plans a cautious rollout, starting with robots operating at a safe distance from humans and gradually increasing interaction as safety improves.To accelerate development, Google is collaborating with robotics companies like Apptronik, with whom it is crafting humanoid robots, as well as Agile Robots and Boston Dynamics — the latter a former Alphabet subsidiary sold to SoftBank in 2017.
Article Summary: Gemini Robotics and Gemini Robotics-ER are Google's new artificial intelligence models. They are designed to tackle a persistent challenge in robotics: Enabling machines to adapt to unpredictable, real-world scenarios. Google plans a cautious rollout, starting with robots operating at a safe distance from humans and gradually increasing interaction as safety improves.

Article Title: US President Donald Trump makes a 'Big Tesla Terrorism' announcement, says 'I will do that, I will ...'
Article Text:
“I will do that, I’ll do it,” Trump affirmed when pressed further on the domestic terrorism label. “I’m going to stop them.” He emphasized that the attackers are “damaging a great American company.”

Republican lawmakers are pushing for investigations into vandalism targeting Tesla' showrooms and charging stations in the US, following President Donald Trump's suggestion that such acts could be classified as domestic terrorism. On Tuesday, March 11, US President Donald Trump publicly backed Elon Musk by buying a Tesla vehicle. During a White House event, surrounded by five Tesla cars brought for his review, Trump was asked by a reporter if those attacking Tesla owners and dealerships should be deemed domestic terrorists. “I think he’s been treated very unfairly by a tiny group of people,” Trump replied. “I just want people to know he can’t be punished for being a patriot -— and he’s a great patriot.”Trump’s display of solidarity with Elon Musk follows escalating protests at Tesla showrooms nationwide, some of which have turned destructive. The unrest stems from opposition to Musk’s leadership of the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), which has driven significant federal job cuts and exposed wasteful government spending.The official White House Twitter account shared a photo of President Donald Trump, Elon Musk, and Lil X alongside a red Tesla and a Tesla Cybertruck, with an American flag emoji preceding each of their names.Twitter user who goes by the name DogeDesigner wrote, "President Trump on Cybertruck: "Look! I think I have a great imagination. Who else but this guy would design this? And everybody on the road is looking at it. It's amazing actually. That is the coolest design."Following on the same, the House Speaker Mike Johnson announced that Congress would probe incidents involving Tesla vehicles. In a post on Twitter, the Louisiana Republican vowed that lawmakers would work with the Justice Department and FBI to "ensure those responsible face the full force of the law."Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, along with seven other House Republicans, penned a letter to Attorney General Pam Bondi and FBI Director Kash Patel, urging investigations into what they called a "wave of coordinated attacks" on Elon Musk, Tesla dealerships, charging stations, and vehicles.
Article Summary: Republican lawmakers are pushing for investigations into vandalism targeting Tesla' showrooms and charging stations in the US. US President Donald Trump publicly backed Elon Musk by buying a Tesla vehicle. Trump was asked by a reporter if those attacking Tesla owners and dealerships should be deemed domestic terrorists.

Article Title: Amazon Prime Video is bringing Donald Trump starrer ‘The Apprentice’ to your TVs: All details
Article Text:
What Trump said about The Apprentice coming to Amazon Prime Video



“I look forward to watching this show myself -- such great memories, and so much fun, but most importantly, it was a learning experience for all of us!

The Apprentice

is one of the best shows that I ever produced. The charismatic onscreen presence of President Donald J. Trump made it a bona fide hit! Now, thanks to Prime Video, a whole new audience will experience a new season every Monday.”

‘The Apprentice’ made debut in 2004, long before Donald Trump became US President



Amazon Prime Video has started streaming the reruns of “The Apprentice ,” the reality television show starring the US President Donald Trump . The first season of the show became available on Amazon Prime Video this week. Soon after, the content streaming platform started advertising the same on its landing page. Amazon plans to release new seasons of “The Apprentice” weekly, with the seventh season scheduled to become available in April. This follows an earlier announcement from Amazon's streaming service that it would also air a documentary providing a behind-the-scenes look at First Lady Melania Trump .In a statement shared by Amazon, Trump expressed his enthusiasm for the program's revival—a show where he served as a producer. Trump said:Debuting in 2004, the reality TV series ‘The Apprentice’ emerged after Trump reportedly experienced a series of bankruptcies and business setbacks in the 1990s, which had significantly damaged his New York real estate empire.The show featured Trump as a tough business tycoon judging aspiring entrepreneurs in a competitive format. Contestants competed for his favor to advance, with failures met with Trump's signature "You're fired!" dismissal. The champion earned a six-figure position within Trump's business organisation.The series is owned by MGM Alternative , whose parent company was bought by Amazon three years ago, transforming Trump's name into a global brand, playing a significant role in launching his subsequent political career.The show expanded globally with numerous international adaptations, many of which continued broadcasting even after the original American version ended. Despite Trump being removed from the US program in 2015 following controversial comments about Mexican immigrants, the UK edition remains on air at the BBC.
Article Summary: The first season of ‘The Apprentice’ became available on Amazon Prime Video this week. Amazon plans to release new seasons weekly, with the seventh season scheduled to become available in April. This follows an earlier announcement that it would also air a documentary providing a behind-the-scenes look at First Lady Melania Trump.

Article Title: NYT Connections hints and answers for today: March 9 puzzle solved
Article Text:
What is NYT’s ‘Connections’ game?

NYT Connections hints for March 9, 2025

Yellow: Computer input devices

Green: Building materials

Blue: Helpful deed

Purple: #1 songs from 1982

NYT Connections answers March 9, 2025

Yellow- Computer input devices – Microphone, Mouse, Scanner, Tablet

Green- Building materials – Brick, Concrete, Metal, Stone

Blue- Helpful deed – Favor, Kindness, Service, Solid

Purple- #1 songs from 1982 – Abracadabra, Centerfold, Mickey, Physical

How to play NYT Connections

You will receive a grid of 16 words.

Your goal is to sort these words into four groups of four based on their hidden connections.

Connections may include: Synonyms or antonyms.

Shared themes, such as objects, professions, or word families.

Wordplay or shared prefixes/suffixes.

A new puzzle is released daily at midnight.

You can play the puzzle on the New York Times website or app.

Look at the grid and identify words that seem related.

Experiment with grouping words that share a logical connection, such as names of mythical characters, clickable items, or objects used in a specific context.

Select four words you think belong together.

Click the "Submit" button to test your group.

If your group is correct, it will be locked in, and its category will be color-coded.

If incorrect, you lose a life.

You start with four lives.

Making four incorrect guesses ends the game.

Sometimes, the game provides a hint that you’re one word away from forming a correct group.

Use this to swap and refine your selections.

Correct groups are categorized as:Yellow: Easiest to guess.

Blue and Green: Moderate difficulty.

Purple: Hardest, often involving complex wordplay.

The game records your streaks and overall performance.

Challenge your friends or share results to see who solves the puzzles fastest.

If you run out of lives, the game ends.

Return the next day for a new puzzle and continue improving your skills!

Strategies for tackling NYT Connections puzzles

Identify Obvious Groups: Start with the most apparent connections, like mythology or objects with specific features.

Use Process of Elimination: Cross off words as you place them into groups, narrowing the possibilities for the remaining categories.

Think Creatively: Some categories require outside-the-box thinking, like interpreting word segments or understanding cultural references.

Learn from Mistakes: Each incorrect guess provides clues. Use these to refine your approach for future puzzles.

Other NYT games to sharpen your skills

NYT Mini Crossword: A quick yet challenging crossword experience.

Spelling Bee: Build as many words as possible using a set of seven letters.

Wordle: Solve a five-letter word puzzle with limited guesses.

Strands: A unique 6x8 word search that uses zig-zag solutions.

|

Article Title: How Jim Walker, the man who saw 2008 Stock Market crash coming, may have just 'agreed' with Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath's 'Stock Market Gyaan'
Article Text:
Jim Walker to investors: Take long-term investment approach

Jim Walker picks India over China

Indian stock markets witnessed Bears onslaught in the month of February, with the benchmark Sensex closing over 4,000 points lower. The carnage witnessed in the market during the month led to a staggering erosion of over Rs 40 lakh crore from the market capitalisation of BSE-listed companies; while Nifty 50 marked its longest losing streak since its inception in the year 1996. The relentless downward trend has left retail investors anxious. In a message to investors late earlier this week, Zerodha founder and CEO Nithin Kamath termed the fall as "the first real market correction " since Covid pandemic."Markets are cyclical, and given the way our markets went up from late 2020, this fall was inevitable," he said. Kamath told investors to not get carried away by the doom and gloom in the market and continue investing in SIPs. "I don't know how good the data is, but it seems like the number of investors stopping their SIPs has gone up. This is the wrong thing to do. What an SIP helps you do is to average your investments across different market cycles," he said.In an exclusive conversation with ETNow, Walker shared his insights on the global economy and his outlook on India. While many fear that the current market exuberance could lead to a collapse similar to 2008, Walker sees it differently. A similar sentiment comes from Jim Walker, a celebrated economist from Alethia Capital who famously foresaw the 2008 financial crisis.Speaking with ETNow, he acknowledged a global economic slowdown but stressed that the circumstances differ markedly from those preceding the financial debacle over ten years ago. Similar to Nithin Kamath, Walker batted for a long-term investment approach. Walker encouraged his clients to boost their stakes in India, despite valuation concerns in its stock market. “I’ve advised clients this week to significantly increase their investments in India. Though stock valuations raise eyebrows, I believe economic growth will soon justify them with strong corporate earnings,” he elaborated.Known for his prescient 2006-07 warning of a looming U.S. housing market crash, Walker remarked that today’s danger signals are less evident. “The signs were glaring in 2006-07 when we predicted a severe downturn driven by excesses in the property sector; it’s not the same now,” he said.He pointed out that unlike the lead-up to 2008, there are currently no significant overindulgences in the housing or financial sectors poised to spark a major banking crisis. Although certain areas show excessive stock market gains and asset price inflation, Walker believes these won’t lead to widespread corporate failures that could rattle the banking system. “We’re not seeing the kind of corporate collapses that impacted banks in 2008. That’s not on the horizon,” he observed.Additionally, Walker expressed a stronger preference for investing in India over China, suggesting it might be an opportune moment to increase investments there. He is especially sanguine about India’s prospects, citing its robust policy environment—the best in three decades—as a key factor enhancing its appeal to investors. “India’s policy stability and certainty are at their peak in the last 30 years,” he asserted, crediting solid monetary and fiscal policies along with exchange rate stability for bolstering India’s economic structure.He also commended the Indian government’s steps toward deregulation and business-friendly policies, seeing them as key drivers of future growth. Walker believes that supporting small and medium enterprises will further boost economic and job expansion.
Article Summary: Jim Walker picks India over China as an opportune moment to increase investments there. He is especially sanguine about India’s prospects, citing its robust policy environment as a key factor. Walker encouraged his clients to boost their stakes in India, despite valuation concerns in its stock market.

The Mini Crossword at Times of India offers a quick yet engaging puzzle challenge that refreshes daily. It’s perfect for players who enjoy solving puzzles but have limited time. Whether you're new to crossword puzzles or a seasoned pro, our mini version offers the perfect mix of challenge and fun.Start your day with a brain-teasing puzzle that will sharpen your vocabulary and improve your problem-solving skills. With new puzzles updated daily, this crossword is ideal for players looking to relax or take a short break during a busy schedule.The Mini Crossword follows the classic crossword puzzle format but in a condensed form, allowing you to solve it quickly while still enjoying the thrill of figuring out the clues. Simply read the hints, enter the correct answers, and fill in the grid. The simple interface ensures a smooth and enjoyable experience for all ages. If you're looking for more games, TOI has a wide range of other puzzles and brain teasers to explore. Stay sharp with Sudoku, Word Search, and many more options available at your fingertips!Take a moment to familiarise yourself with the crossword grid and the clues provided.Begin by selecting a clue from the list. Categories are Across and Down. Read the clue carefully, then think of the corresponding word or phrase that fits the grid.Click on the first box of the word you want to enter. Start typing the letters of your answer. Keep going until you've completed the word or phrase.Need a hint? "Reveal Character" uncovers one letter. But be wary, using it incurs time penalties which increases with every usage. It's best to use this sparingly to maintain a good completion time.Keep an eye on the timer displayed. Faster completions with minimum penalties fetch higher ranks.The more you play, the better you'll become. Experiment with different solving strategies to find what works best for you.Welcome, puzzle enthusiasts! Today we're exploring scientific spaces, measurement tools, printing techniques, timing concepts, primal characteristics, and financial actions. Ready to decode these intriguing clues?When discovery needs a home...Research space?When measurement is critical...Precision instrument?When boundaries are crossed...Edge extension?When timing separates...Time's gap?When civility vanishes...Primal force?When currency exchanges hands...Wallet's action?From scientific laboratories to financial transactions, from printing techniques to timing concepts - we've explored quite a range today! Remember, crossing letters can help illuminate your path to the solution. Keep solving!The Mini Crossword is a smaller, quicker version of a traditional crossword puzzle. Typically featuring a 5x5 grid, it is designed to be completed in just a few minutes, offering a bite-sized puzzle experience that’s perfect for busy players or those new to crosswords.Playing the Mini Crossword is simple. Just read the clues and fill in the corresponding boxes with the correct answers. Horizontal clues fill the "across" spaces, while vertical clues correspond to "down" spaces.The Mini Crossword is shorter and simpler than a regular crossword, usually containing fewer and shorter words. It can typically be completed within a few minutes, making it an excellent option for casual puzzle solvers or those looking for a quick brain teaser.The Mini Crossword is shorter and simpler than a regular crossword, usually containing fewer and shorter words. It can typically be completed within a few minutes, making it an excellent option for casual puzzle solvers or those looking for a quick brain teaser.The Mini Crossword is shorter and simpler than a regular crossword, usually containing fewer and shorter words. It can typically be completed within a few minutes, making it an excellent option for casual puzzle solvers or those looking for a quick brain teaser.The Mini Crossword is shorter and simpler than a regular crossword, usually containing fewer and shorter words. It can typically be completed within a few minutes, making it an excellent option for casual puzzle solvers or those looking for a quick brain teaser.If you’re stuck on a clue, don’t worry! You can skip to other clues and return later, or use the "hint" function to reveal a letter or word, helping you solve the puzzle more easily.To improve, try solving puzzles regularly. As you practice, you'll start to recognize common word patterns and develop strategies to solve puzzles more quickly and accurately. You can also review past puzzles for additional practice.
Article Summary: The Mini Crossword at Times of India offers a quick yet engaging puzzle challenge that refreshes daily. With new puzzles updated daily, this crossword is ideal for players looking to relax or take a short break during a busy schedule. Simply read the hints, enter the correct answers and fill in the grid.

Article Title: Apple launches MacBook Air with M4 chip, new colour, and a more affordable price
Article Text: Apple has launched the latest MacBook Air with the new M4 chip, offering improved performance and a new sky blue color option. The laptops, available in 13-inch and 15-inch models, start at Rs 99,900 in India, with lower prices for students. Pre-orders are open, with shipments beginning on March 12.
Article Summary: Apple launches MacBook Air with new M4 chip and sky blue color option. Laptops start at Rs 99,900 in India, with lower prices for students. Pre-orders are open, with shipments beginning on March 12. The laptops are available in 13-inch and 15-inch models.

Article Title: Elon Musk's one-word comment on Apple taking UK government to court
Article Text: Elon Musk has endorsed Apple's legal challenge against the UK government's demand for access to encrypted iCloud data. Apple has appealed the order, which they argue compromises user security, and has disabled its Advanced Data Protection feature for UK users in the meantime. The UK government insists it is balancing privacy and national security concerns.
Article Summary: Apple has appealed the order, which they argue compromises user security. Apple has disabled its Advanced Data Protection feature for UK users in the meantime. The UK government insists it is balancing privacy and national security concerns. Elon Musk has endorsed Apple's legal challenge against the UK government.

Article Title: Samsung rolls out One UI 7 beta to Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 devices
Article Text:
Samsung One UI 7 features

Samsung has announced the expansion of its Galaxy AI features to a wider range of devices through the One UI 7 beta program . The new update aims to deliver a more natural and seamless mobile AI experience for Galaxy users. As announced by the company, the beta program will be available for the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 in India, Korea, the U.K., and the U.S. starting March 6, with additional devices including the Galaxy S23 series, Tab S10 series, and A55 joining later in the month.Users can sign up for the beta program through the Samsung Members app, with the official One UI 7 update expected to roll out in April. One UI 7 introduces advanced AI agents with multimodal capabilities, enhancing the interface to provide a more intuitive and interactive mobile experience.Samsung's One UI 7 update introduces enhanced security features through the Knox Matrix system, offering a more transparent and user-friendly way to manage security across connected devices. The update includes a new Knox Matrix dashboard, allowing users to quickly check the security status of their Galaxy mobile devices, smart TVs, and home appliances. Devices marked ‘green’ are secure, while at-risk devices trigger alerts with actionable recommendations to fix potential threats.One UI 7 also simplifies data recovery with its Enhanced Data Protection feature. Users who lose access to a trusted device can securely transfer data stored on Samsung Cloud to a new device by verifying the lock screen method (pin, pattern, or password) of the old device.The update introduces passkey login for Samsung Accounts, providing a more secure and convenient authentication option. The Maximum Restrictions feature now offers additional network controls, including blocking 2G services and avoiding auto-reconnection to less secure Wi-Fi networks.To combat malicious apps, One UI 7’s Safe Install feature works with Auto Blocker to warn users about downloads from untrusted sources. The update also brings exclusive security features to Galaxy devices, adding to the Android suite of theft protection tools. The new Identity Check feature provides an extra layer of security if a device’s PIN is compromised, complementing existing tools like Theft Detection Lock, Offline Device Lock, and Remote Lock.
Article Summary: Samsung has announced the expansion of its Galaxy AI features to a wider range of devices through the One UI 7 beta program. The new update aims to deliver a more natural and seamless mobile AI experience for Galaxy users. The beta program will be available for the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 in India, Korea, the U.K., and theU.S. starting March 6.

Article Title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says ‘more proud of a…’ than ChatGPT maker’s team
Article Text:
Sam Altman gives update on GPT-4.5

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently posted on X (formerly Twitter) saying that, for him, even the biggest tech breakthroughs can't compare to a personal milestone: his newborn son learning how to eat. In the post, Altman wrote “very proud of the openai team for what is perhaps the most impressive scientific/technical breakthrough of recent decades…thought that was the thing i'd always be most proud of in life”. Adding further, he wrote “turns out i am now more proud of a preemie baby for learning how to eat on his own!”.In a follow-up post, Altman wrote “i realize i am getting neurochemically hacked here but idc, it's the best)”.Sam Altman welcomed his baby boy last month with his partner and software engineer Oliver Mulherin. The baby arrived prematurely and has been receiving care in the neonatal intensive care unit (NICU).In another news, the CEO shared an update about the company’s latest version of the large language model (LLM), GPT-4.5 . In an X post, Altman announced that GPT-4.5 is expected to roll out to ChatGPT Plus subscribers. However, he noted that the update will be a staggered rollout over several days to manage high demand and ensure a smooth user experience.Altman also explained that launching with a low rate limit would restrict usage and prevent users from having meaningful interactions with the new model. The staggered release will allow users to have longer conversations with GPT-4.5, even if it means some subscribers will have to wait a bit longer to access it.In his X announcement, Altman wrote: “We are likely going to roll out GPT-4.5 to the plus tier over a few days. There is no perfect way to do this; we wanted to do it for everyone tomorrow, but it would have meant we had to launch with a very low rate limit. We think people are gonna use this a lot and love it.”
Article Summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently posted on X (formerly Twitter) saying that, for him, even the biggest tech breakthroughs can't compare to a personal milestone: his newborn son learning how to eat. In an X post, Altman announced that GPT-4.5 is expected to roll out to ChatGPT Plus subscribers.

Article Title: YouTube scam warning: How hackers using AI video of CEO Neal Mohan to target people
Article Text:
Read YouTube's scam warning:

Phishing Campaign

Using Private Video Sharing

We’re aware that phishers have been sharing private videos to send false videos, including an AI generated video of YouTube’s CEO Neal Mohan announcing changes in monetization.

YouTube and its employees will never attempt to contact you or share information through a private video. If a video is shared privately with you claiming to be from YouTube, the video is a

phishing scam

. Do not click these links as the videos will likely lead to phishing sites that can install malware or steal your credentials. Never click on links in these videos and you can report the video by following these steps.

Many phishers actively target Creators by trying to find ways to impersonate YouTube by exploiting in-platform features to link to malicious content. Please always be aware and make sure not to open untrusted links or files!

Rob, TeamYouTube
Article Summary: YouTube is aware that phishers have been sharing private videos to send false videos. The videos will likely lead to phishing sites that can install malware or steal your credentials. Never click on links in these videos and you can report the video by following these steps.

Article Title: Income Tax officials may be able to access your email, Facebook, Instagram and other social media accounts starting FY2026-27 if they suspect ...
Article Text:
What is the new addition 'Virtual Digital Space' to the Income Tax Act

Come April 1 of Fiscal Year 2026-27, a new rule in the Income Tax Act law may grant the Income Tax department powers to access your social media accounts or emails in case they suspect tax evasion . Income Tax Bill 2025, which was introduced in the Parliament recently, will give Income Tax officials the legal authourity to access and inspect a wide range of personal and financial digital spaces, termed Virtual Digital Spaces in the bill. This means that the Income Tax department can break into social media accounts, personal emails, bank accounts, online investment accounts, trading accounts, and more if they have any reason to believe that you own any undisclosed income, money, Gold, Jewelry, or valuable item or property on which you haven’t paid applicable Income Tax.Presently, Section 132 of the Income Tax Act, 1961, allows Income Tax officials to seize assets and books during search operations if they find sufficient reasons to believe that an individual is in possession of undisclosed income or assets. The changes in the bill, once passed in the Parliament, will extend this authourity to the digital realm, allowing officials to bypass security measures on computer systems and virtual spaces.The Clause 247 of the Income Tax Bill outlines this expanded power, stating that officers can “break open the lock of any door, box, locker, safe, almirah, or other receptacle” or “gain access by overriding the access code” to computer systems or virtual digital spaces when access is otherwise unavailable. This applies if they believe an individual possesses undisclosed income or assets taxable under the law.According to the bill, the term Virtual Digital Space includes email servers, social media accounts, online investment accounts, trading accounts, banking accounts, and any website used for storing details of ownership of any asset. It further adds that virtual digital space is an environment, area or realm that is constructed and experienced through computer technology and not the physical, tangible world, which encompasses any digital realm that allows users to interact, communicate and perform activities using computer systems, computer networks, computer resources, communication devices, cyberspace, internet, worldwide web and emerging technologies, using data and information in the electronic form for creation, storage or exchange and includes:* Email servers* Social media account* Online investment account, trading account, banking account, etc* Any website used for storing details of ownership of any asset* Remote server or cloud servers* Digital application platforms* Any other space of similar natureAs to who all can wield this authority? The bill designates “authorised officers” as senior tax officials, including Joint Directors, Additional Directors, Joint Commissioners, Additional Commissioners, Assistant or Deputy Directors, Assistant or Deputy Commissioners, Income Tax Officers, and Tax Recovery Officers.What does this mean for individuals? The new rules significantly widen the scope of tax investigations, giving officials the ability to probe deeply into personal and financial digital footprints. As this provision takes effect, it raises questions about privacy and the balance between tax enforcement and individual rights.
Article Summary: Income Tax Bill 2025 will give Income Tax officials the legal authourity to access and inspect a wide range of personal and financial digital spaces. This includes email servers, social media accounts, online investment accounts, trading accounts, banking accounts, and any website used for storing details of ownership of any asset.

Article Title: GTA 6 launch: Rockstar confirms GTA 6 release window as fans anticipate trailer 2
Article Text:
GTA 6: Confirmation of release timeline







GTA 6: Anticipation for trailer 2

GTA 6: Speculation and leaks

GTA 6: Celebrity involvement and pre-orders

Rockstar Games has officially confirmed the release timeline for Grand Theft Auto VI (GTA 6), setting the stage for an autumn 2025 launch. This announcement has fueled speculation about the imminent release of the second trailer, as fans eagerly await more details about the highly anticipated game.During a recent earnings call, Take-Two Interactive, Rockstar's parent company, reaffirmed that GTA 6 is on track for a fall 2025 release. This confirmation comes after months of speculation and excitement following the first trailer's release in December 2023. The game is expected to be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.Fans are closely monitoring Rockstar's activities for any hints about the second trailer. The company recently reduced its Instagram posts to 12, a move that has historically preceded significant announcements. This has led to widespread speculation that Rockstar is preparing for the next phase of GTA 6 marketing. Community discussions suggest that the second trailer could provide further details on gameplay mechanics, map design, and new features.The gaming community is abuzz with theories and leaks about what the second trailer might reveal. Some speculate that the game will feature an interactive ecosystem similar to Red Dead Redemption 2, with notable wildlife mechanics. There are also rumours about the introduction of new vehicles, a second city, and dual protagonists inspired by Bonnie and Clyde.Adding to the excitement, WWE star John Cena recently shared the official GTA 6 artwork on his Instagram, sparking theories about a potential cameo in the game or an upcoming announcement. Meanwhile, a gaming retailer in Malaysia has reportedly begun accepting pre-orders for GTA 6, even before Rockstar has announced an exact release date. This early availability of reservations hints at increasing confidence in the projected 2025 release window.
Article Summary: Rockstar Games has confirmed the release timeline for Grand Theft Auto VI. The game is expected to be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. This announcement has fueled speculation about the imminent release of the second trailer. The gaming community is abuzz with theories and leaks about what the second Trailer might reveal.

Article Title: Apple Mac Studio with M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips launched as ‘the most powerful Mac ever’
Article Text:
Mac Studio price and availability

Mac Studio with M4 Max features

Mac Studio with M4 Max enables:

Up to 1.6x faster image processing in Adobe Photoshop when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 2.9x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Up to 2.1x faster build performance when compiling code in Xcode when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 3.1x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Up to 1.2x faster ProRes transcode performance in Compressor when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 2.8x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Up to 1.6x faster video processing performance in Topaz Video AI when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Max, and up to 5x faster when compared to the 27-inch iMac with Core i9.

Mac Studio with M3 Ultra features

Mac Studio with M3 Ultra enables:

Up to 16.9x faster token generation using an LLM with hundreds of billions of parameters in LM Studio when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, thanks to its massive amounts of unified memory.

Up to 2.6x faster scene rendering performance in Maxon Redshift when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, and up to 6.4x faster when compared to the 16-core Intel-based Mac Pro with Radeon Pro W5700X.

Up to 1.1x faster basecalling for DNA sequencing in Oxford Nanopore MinKNOW when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, and up to 21.1x faster when compared to the 16-core Intel-based Mac Pro with Radeon Pro W5700X.

Up to 1.4x faster 8K video rendering performance in Final Cut Pro when compared to Mac Studio with M1 Ultra, and up to 4x faster when compared to the 16-core Intel-based Mac Pro with Radeon Pro W5700X

Apple today announced the new Mac Studio, featuring the M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips. The desktop computer offers improved performance, enhanced connectivity with Thunderbolt 5, and new features in a compact design. It is designed for professional users who require high performance for demanding workloads.Apple says that the Mac Studio is capable of running large language models with over 600 billion parameters in memory, thanks to its GPU and up to 512GB of unified memory with the M3 Ultra chip . It also supports Apple Intelligence, a system aimed at improving productivity while maintaining privacy. The new Mac Studio is available for pre-order, with availability beginning March 12.“The new Mac Studio is the most powerful Mac we’ve ever made,” said John Ternus, Apple’s senior vice president of Hardware Engineering. “A complete game-changer for pros around the world — powering both home and pro studios — Mac Studio sits in a class of its own, offering a staggering amount of performance in a compact, quiet design that fits beautifully on your desk. With this new Mac Studio, we’re delivering even more extreme performance with M4 Max and M3 Ultra, support for half a terabyte of unified memory, up to 16TB of superfast storage, and Thunderbolt 5 connectivity. Mac Studio truly is the ultimate pro desktop.”Mac Studio comes at a starting price of Rs 2,14,900 in India. For education, it can be purchased for Rs 1,94,900. Additional configure-to-order options are available at apple.com/in/store.Customers can pre-order the new Mac Studio starting March 5 on apple.com/in/store and in the Apple Store app. It will begin arriving to customers, and will be in Apple Store locations and Apple Authorized Resellers, starting March 12.The Mac Studio with M4 Max is designed for professionals such as video editors, developers, and creative users. It features a 16-core CPU, a 40-core GPU, and a faster Neural Engine, providing significant performance gains over previous models. The M4 Max also supports up to 128GB of unified memory and includes a Media Engine for improved video processing.Mac Studio with M4 Max starts at 36GB of unified memory, with support for up to 128GB. Apple claims that Mac Studio with M4 Max is up to 3.5x faster than Mac Studio with M1 Max, and is up to 6.1x faster than the most powerful Intel-based 27-inch iMac.The M3 Ultra version offers a 32-core CPU, an 80-core GPU, and a 32-core Neural Engine. It supports up to 512GB of unified memory and 16TB of SSD storage. The M3 Ultra is built for demanding workflows, offering nearly double the performance of the M4 Max in certain tasks.It also offers an up to 80-core GPU, more than any Apple silicon chip; a powerful 32-core Neural Engine for on-device AI and machine learning (ML); and a high-bandwidth memory architecture that delivers over 800GB/s of unified memory bandwidth.The new Mac Studio includes Thunderbolt 5 ports with transfer speeds up to 120 Gb/s, enabling faster external storage and expansion options. Additional connectivity includes a 10Gb Ethernet port, HDMI, and an SDXC card slot, along with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.Apple Intelligence tools, integrated into Mac Studio, include Writing Tools, Priority Notifications, live transcription in Notes, and new Siri improvements. These features aim to enhance productivity for professional users.
Article Summary: Apple announces new Mac Studio, featuring the M4 Max and M3 Ultra chips. The desktop computer offers improved performance, enhanced connectivity with Thunderbolt 5, and new features in a compact design. Mac Studio comes at a starting price of Rs 2,14,900 in India. For education, it can be purchased for Rs 1,94,900.

Article Title: Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak on why he not for AI
Article Text: Steve Wozniak has raised concerns about the misuse of AI at the Mobile World Congress, warning of its potential for deception. He criticized Elon Musk’s leadership style for lacking compromise and criticised Big Tech for dominating our lives through subscriptions. Wozniak emphasized his distrust of the 'artificial' aspect of AI.
Article Summary: Steve Wozniak has raised concerns about the misuse of AI at the Mobile World Congress. He criticized Elon Musk’s leadership style for lacking compromise and criticised Big Tech for dominating our lives through subscriptions. He emphasized his distrust of the 'artificial' aspect of AI.

Article Title: Oyo CEO Ritesh Agarwal reveals top two best-performing religious destinations
Article Text:
Oyo CEO Ritesh Aggarwal reflects on his early days

Oyo’s partnership with Amazon Prime’s Jack Reacher series

Oyo founder and CEO Ritesh Agarwal sees major growth in India’s religious tourism sector, predicting it could generate $150-200 billion in the next 3-4 years, reports MoneyControl. Speaking at the TiE Con Mumbai 2025 summit, Aggarwal highlighted the increasing demand for accommodations in pilgrimage destinations. He said: “More than 5 lakh people stayed with Oyo during the Kumbh in Prayagraj. Around 20% of our revenue comes from religious destinations. The top two are Banaras and Tirupati , which are the best-performing markets in India”.He highlighted Tirupati's high daily visitor influx, which surges during school holidays, and noted the increasing demand in emerging religious hubs such as Kanyakumari and Somnath.“New hotels are being built, giving people more options. Earlier, they would only stay in dharamshalas, but now, better accommodations encourage longer stays,” he added.Agarwal cited Ayodhya as an example of religious tourism driving economic growth. "The town's economy has changed. Every person I have met has seen their income grow 2-3 times—whether through hotels, restaurants, real estate, or land sales. It’s a massive opportunity," he said, calling it a promising space for startups.During the event, Agarwal reflected on his early days, recalling a key investment from Dr. Apoorva Ranjan Sharma, an early backer of Oyo’s parent company, Oravel Stays."At first, I wasn’t keen on meeting investors, but Dr. Sharma insisted. He invited me to Mumbai and introduced me to two investors at Iskcon Mandir in Juhu. They believed my business could be worth millions, but I was struggling to pay rent. They gave me a Rs 5 lakh loan—that money changed my life," he said.Sharma later sold his shares for $400 million but reinvested when Oyo was valued at $6 billion. "He has been a lifetime partner, on and off, but always a friend," Agarwal noted.On success, Agarwal acknowledged luck but emphasized hard work. "Many things had to go right for me. But hard work increases the probability of being lucky. That’s what I focus on," he saidOyo recently announced a £50 million investment in the UK and a $10 million investment to develop digital assets for G6 Hospitality in the US."In FY25, Oyo did about Rs 30,000 crore in bookings, with Rs 24,000 crore coming from customers outside India. Our US business is doing well. Motel 6 is the most popular economy hotel brand there," Agarwal said. He mentioned a partnership with Amazon Prime’s Jack Reacher series, where Motel 6 was featured.The US business is a key revenue driver. "In FY25, we expected Rs 1,200 crore in EBITDA without Motel 6. Including it, we are at Rs 1,550 crore. We plan to open more Motel 6 properties," he said.
Article Summary: Oyo founder and CEO Ritesh Agarwal sees major growth in India’s religious tourism sector. He predicts it could generate $150-200 billion in the next 3-4 years. Oyo recently announced a £50 million investment in the UK.

Article Title: Airtel and Jio bring Elon Musk’s Starlink for high-speed satellite internet in India: What this means for users
Article Text: Airtel and Jio have joined hands with Elon Musk's Starlink to bring satellite internet services to India. This partnership aims to enhance digital connectivity in rural and remote areas, providing online education, telemedicine, and disaster relief. Starlink's low Earth orbit satellites offer a solution where traditional infrastructure fails, emphasizing technology in promoting economic development.
Article Summary: Airtel and Jio have joined hands with Elon Musk's Starlink to bring satellite internet services to India. This partnership aims to enhance digital connectivity in rural and remote areas. Starlink's low Earth orbit satellites offer a solution where traditional infrastructure fails.

Article Title: TSMC wants Nvidia, AMD, Broadcom to be a part of this Intel joint venture
Article Text:
Why some Intel executives may oppose the JV with TSMC



TSMC has a joint venture proposal for US chip designers Nvidia, Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and Broadcom, a report claims. A report by the news agency Reuters cited sources familiar with the matter noted that the Taiwan-based chipmaker has asked these chip designers to operate Intel's chip factories. Under the proposal, TSMC will manage the operations of Intel's foundry division – which produces chips tailored to customer needs – but would maintain a minority stake, not exceeding 50%, the report notes.As per the report, multiple sources have confirmed that Qualcomm has also been approached by TSMC with this joint venture proposal. If things go as planned, this joint venture would see TSMC taking on the operational responsibilities of Intel's foundry business, while remaining a minority stakeholder, the report adds. Intel's foundry division specialises in manufacturing chips designed to meet the specific requirements of various clients.According to the report, the proposal for TSMC to partner with US chip designers for an Intel foundry joint venture is in its early stages and originated from a request by the Trump administration for TSMC to assist the struggling US chip icon.Details of TSMC's plan to hold a minority stake and its outreach to potential partners is the latest development. Any final agreement would require approval from the Trump administration, which aims to prevent full foreign ownership of Intel's foundry division.Last year, Intel reported a net loss of $18.8 billion, its first since 1986, due to large impairments. The company's foundry division had a book value of $108 billion as of December 31, 2024. Intel's shares also lost over half their value in the past year.TSMC has proposed a joint venture for Intel’s foundry division, pitching the idea to investors before announcing a $100 billion US investment plan with Trump earlier this month. Talks about the joint venture are ongoing, with TSMC seeking multiple chip designer partners, the report claims.Several companies have shown interest in acquiring parts of Intel, but the company has rejected selling its chip design house separately from the foundry division. Qualcomm has also exited earlier acquisition discussions.Intel's board supports negotiations with TSMC, while some executives oppose the deal. Former CEO Pat Gelsinger, who prioritised Intel’s contract manufacturing business, was ousted in December 2024. Meanwhile, the new interim co-CEOs have put Intel’s AI chip project on hold.A partnership between Intel and TSMC would face challenges due to differences in manufacturing processes, chemicals, and chipmaking tools, the report notes. Previously, Intel has partnered with Taiwan’s UMC and Israel’s Tower Semiconductor, but trade manufacturing secrets remain a concern.TSMC wants joint venture investors to be Intel’s advanced manufacturing customers. Nvidia and Broadcom are also reportedly testing Intel’s 18A manufacturing process, while AMD is evaluating it. The 18A technology has been a point of contention in Intel-TSMC negotiations, with Intel claiming it is superior to TSMC’s 2-nanometer process.
Article Summary: TSMC has proposed a joint venture for Intel’s foundry division, pitching the idea to investors before announcing a $100 billion US investment plan with Trump earlier this month. Talks about the joint venture are ongoing, with TSMC seeking multiple chip designer partners, the report claims. Qualcomm has also been approached by TSMC with this joint venture proposal. Any final agreement would require approval from the Trump administration.

Article Title: SBI down: Here’s what the bank has to say
Article Text:
SBI suffers second outage in two days

State Bank of India (SBI) has said that customers may encounter significant disruptions to the bank's online services such as UPI due to technical issues. The bank has said that they are actively working to address the problems.“We are facing technical issues in UPl, due to which customers may face issues in availing UPI services. UPI Services will be resumed by 20:00 Hrs IST dated 12.03.2025,” SBI said in a post on X.“Customers may continue to use UPI lite services for uninterrupted service,” it added.However, at the time of writing, the bank has not provided an update whether the services are back online. Customers are advised to stay updated through official SBI channels for further information and updates regarding the service disruptions.As per the data from the outage tracking website Downdetector, a sharp increase in reported problems started around 7:51 pm Indian Standard Time (IST).Online banking services have also been significantly impacted, representing the maximum 55% of the reported problems. Mobile banking is the second-most affected area, accounting for 26% of all reports. Additionally, problems in funds transfer have been reported by 19% of users, indicating a broader range of accessibility issues.The development comes a day after SBI announced that it faced technical problems in UPI that have affected the service.“We are facing technical issues in UPI, due to which customers may face intermittent issues in availing UPI services. UPI Services will be resumed by 15:30 Hrs IST dated 11.03.2025. Customers may continue to use UPI lite services for uninterrupted service,” SBI said in a post on Tuesday.
Article Summary: State Bank of India (SBI) has said that customers may encounter significant disruptions to the bank's online services such as UPI due to technical issues. The bank has not provided an update whether the services are back online. The development comes a day after SBI announced that it faced technical problems in UPI that have affected the service.

Article Title: Billionaire Harsh Goenka shares Reliance chairman Mukesh Ambani's ‘formula for success’
Article Text:
Also read:

Take a look at video of Mukesh Ambani sharing his formula of success

Mukesh Ambani’s message to students

Billionaire and RPG Group chairman Harsh Goenka recently took to microblogging site X (formerly Twitter) to share a post highlighting Reliance Industries Chairman Mukesh Ambani ’s approach to success. The post features a video of Ambani quoting a powerful message from Swami Vivekananda , emphasizing the importance of unwavering focus on a single idea.In the video, Ambani can be seeing saying “Talking about the winner's mindset, let me share with you a thought that has inspired me all my life. It is Swami Vivekananda's thought. Swamiji says: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life. Dream of it. Think of it. Live on that idea. Let the brain, the body, muscle, nerves (and) every part of your body be full of that idea .. and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.”Goenka captioned the post as “Mukesh Ambani’s formula for success,” highlighting how one of India's most successful business leaders draws inspiration from Swami Vivekananda’s philosophy.Earlier in January, Ambani shared a piece of advice for young students. Speaking at the 12th convocation of Pandit Deendayal Energy University (PDEU), Ambani said that while students should be good at using artificial intelligence (AI), they should not give up on their own critical thinking.He then said: “Talking of Artificial Intelligence, I have a piece of advice to our young students. You must be good at using AI as a tool of learning but do not give up your own critical thinking.”Adding further, he stated “ChatGPT ka jarurat se istemal karo, lekin yaad rakho artificial buddhi se nehi khud ki buddhi se, hum agey badhenge aur aap agey badh sakte hai (Use ChatGPT but don’t use artificial intelligence. Use your intelligence to move forward in life)”.
Article Summary: Harsh Goenka recently shared a post highlighting Mukesh Ambani’s approach to success. The post features a video of Ambani quoting a powerful message from Swami Vivekananda. In the video, Ambani can be seeing saying “Talking about the winner's mindset, let me share with you a thought that has inspired me all my life”

Article Title: Google confirms Chromecast 'Untrusted Device' error; here’s what the company said
Article Text:
What Google said about the issue



How the Chromecast error was affecting users



Chromecast users have reported an "untrusted device" error that is preventing them from using their devices. Google has acknowledged the problem and stated they are currently working on a solution. In the meantime, the tech giant is advising affected users not to factory reset their devices, as this action will prevent the Chromecast from reconnecting to Wi-Fi. The issue appears to be primarily affecting second-generation Chromecast and Chromecast Audio devices, displaying an error message stating, "device couldn’t be verified. This could be caused by outdated device firmware.” However, the timeline for when Google will release a fix for this "untrusted device" error remains unclear.In an email sent to The Verge, Google spokesperson Nicol Addison said that Google is “aware of an issue with some older generation Chromecasts. Once we have more details about the issue and the fix, I’ll share those with you.”As per a report by 9to5Google, the issue initially caught attention on the r/googlehome subreddit, with numerous users reporting that they couldn’t connect to their Chromecast (2nd Gen).Despite employing standard troubleshooting methods—such as restarting, factory resetting, reinstalling the Google Home app, clearing cache/data, and even switching networks—none of these approaches have resolved the problem.Some users have encountered an error message that reads: “Untrusted device: [name] couldn’t be verified. This could be caused by outdated device firmware.” This message effectively locks users out of casting capabilities, as it only provides an option to close the dialog box.Notably, the problem appeared to be confined to older Chromecast models, specifically the 2nd generation Chromecast and Chromecast Audio, while newer devices like the Chromecast (3rd gen) and Chromecast Ultra reportedly didn’t face any issues.Many users were also worried that Google may have silently discontinued support for these older models, rendering them unusable overnight. Given Google's history of sunsetting products without much notice, this concern isn’t entirely unfounded.However, the nature of the error message suggests that the issue may be more attributable to a software bug than an intentional shutdown.If the device has been factory reset, it is recommended to set up the Chromecast with a phone whose date is set to before March 9, 2025. This approach enables the setup process to proceed without encountering any authentication issues.
Article Summary: Chromecast users have reported an "untrusted device" error that is preventing them from using their devices. Google has acknowledged the problem and stated they are currently working on a solution. The tech giant is advising affected users not to factory reset their devices, as this action will prevent the Chromecast from reconnecting to Wi-Fi.

Article Title: Cognizant starts sending bonus letters to eligible employees; says it is ...
Article Text: Cognizant has begun informing eligible employees about their bonus payouts, with amounts ranging between 85% and 115%. Bonuses will be disbursed in March and April based on individual country payroll schedules. Merit pay increases will take effect from August 2025. Infosys has also given salary hikes based on performance, with increases ranging from 5% to 20%.
Article Summary: Cognizant has begun informing eligible employees about their bonus payouts. Bonuses will be disbursed in March and April based on individual country payroll schedules. Merit pay increases will take effect from August 2025. Infosys has also given salary hikes based on performance, with increases ranging from 5% to 20%.

Article Title: Nithin Kamath said how for first time in 15 years Zerodha users have fallen; and Groww may just agree with these numbers
Article Text:
Nithin Kamath states trading activity dropped 30%



Broking firms see decline in active users

Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath recently stated on X (formerly Twitter) that the company is witnessing “degrowth in the business for the first time” in 15 years. His statement comes amid a decline in active users across stock broking platforms like Groww , Zerodha, and Angel One , as the Indian stock market navigates a challenging phase.National Stock Exchange (NSE) data shows that eight of the top 10 broking firms experienced a drop in active investors in February. The total number of registered users across platforms declined by 1.37%, falling to 48.97 million from 49.64 million in January. Despite this, Groww maintained its top position with a 26.57% market share, though its user base shrank by 1.68% to 13.01 million. Zerodha, the second-largest brokerage with a 16.25% share, also recorded a 1.55% drop, bringing its active users down to 7.96 million.In his post, Kamath pointed to a broader slowdown in trading activity, stating, “The markets are finally correcting. Given that markets swing between extremes, they can fall more just like they rose to the peak. I've no idea where the markets go from here, but I can tell you about the broking industry. We are seeing a massive drop in terms of both the number of traders and volumes.”He further highlighted a 30% drop in trading activity across brokers and attributed the downturn to market conditions and regulatory changes. Kamath noted that the slowdown underscores the limited depth of Indian markets, where trading remains concentrated among a small segment of 1-2 crore investors.Angel One, the third-largest brokerage, also reported a 1.53% decline in active users, ending February with 7.65 million clients and a 15.62% market share. Upstox and ICICIdirect, which hold the fourth and fifth spots respectively, saw a drop in active users as well. Upstox, backed by Ratan Tata, recorded a 2.42% month-on-month decline, bringing its user base down to 2.79 million, while ICICIdirect saw a 0.57% dip, with active users falling to 1.94 million.The recent decline in user engagement signals a shift in market sentiment, as broking firms face a slowdown after years of rapid expansion driven by new retail investors.
Article Summary: NSE data shows that eight of the top 10 broking firms experienced a drop in active investors in February. Total number of registered users across platforms declined by 1.37%, falling to 48.97 million from 49.64 million in January. Groww maintained its top position with a 26.57% market share, though its user base shrank by1.68% to 13.01 million.

Article Title: South Korea wants to remove 52-hour work week restriction for employees working in semiconductor companies and the 'reasons' are China, US, Taiwan and Japan
Article Text:
South Korea government planning a bill to remove the exemption

South Korea's Industry and Labour Ministers advocated for exempting semiconductor industry researchers from the nation's 52-hour workweek restriction, which limits their ability to work longer hours when required. According to a report in Yonhap news agency, the South Korean government has been pushing to amend this system to provide flexibility for such workers to extend their hours as needed. The proposal was raised by Industry Minister Ahn Duk-geun and Labour Minister Kim Moon-soo during discussions with semiconductor industry representatives, including key players like Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix . The industry mnister Ahn emphasized the urgency, stating, "The ongoing chip war is a technology war, and a tech war is ultimately a race against time," highlighting the intense global rivalry in the semiconductor sector.Ann said, "The United States, Japan and Taiwan are fostering their semiconductor ecosystems with their national fortunes at stake, while China has almost caught up with our memory chip technology, which is one of our major growth engines." The minister expressed concern that South Korea’s semiconductor industry is uniquely constrained by labor hour regulations. "It is deeply concerning that only our semiconductor industry remains hindered by labor hour regulations," he saidAlthough the government and opposing political parties have debated a special bill to exempt semiconductor workers from the 52-hour workweek, no consensus has been reached. The government has signaled it will explore options to reform the work hour framework for the chip industry.In related economic news, South Korea’s exports for the first 10 days of March rose 2.9 percent year-over-year to US$13.87 billion, driven by robust demand for shipbuilding and automobiles, according to the Korea Customs Service. Imports during the same period climbed 7.3 percent to $15.92 billion, leading to a $2 billion trade deficit. Adjusted for working days—5.5 this year versus six last year—the daily average export volume surged 12.3 percent. In February, exports grew by 1 percent year-over-year, recovering from a decline the prior month.
Article Summary: South Korea's Industry and Labour Ministers advocated for exempting semiconductor industry researchers from the nation's 52-hour workweek restriction. South Korea’s exports for the first 10 days of March rose 2.9 percent year-over-year to US$13.87 billion.

Article Title: ByteDance founder Zhang Yiming becomes China’s richest person; know his early life, net worth and more
Article Text:
China’s wealthiest person Zhang Yiming: Early life

ByteDance founder Zhang Yiming’s journey from startup to tech titan

China’s richest person Zhang Yiming net worth

Zhang Yiming’s vision for ByteDance’s AI and global expansion

ByteDance founder Zhang Yiming has recently joined the list of China's richest individuals according to Forbes, with an estimated net value of $65.5 billion. This comes after his 21% ownership of ByteDance, the parent company of social media app TikTok. Zhang started in 2012 when he started ByteDance from a small four-bedroom apartment in Beijing. His vision was to use machine learning and big data to personalize content for users, revolutionizing the way people consume information worldwide.Zhang entered the tech sphere after completing his studies at Nankai University, where he majored in software engineering. Through college life, he earned some extra money repairing computers and building websites. Zhang had a brief stay at Microsoft, and soon it dawned on him that his interest lay elsewhere than in business life as he quit after six months. His entrepreneurial journey included starting a real estate website before ultimately establishing ByteDance.ByteDance was born when Zhang saw fewer individuals reading newspapers during their subway rides and saw the increased importance of mobile phones as a means of accessing information. He had a vision of a platform where individuals could view personally chosen content based on their interest. ByteDance was a small Beijing startup, but with Zhang's passion, it grew exponentially, giving birth to TikTok, one of the world's most popular apps.Though vastly successful, Zhang is an introverted person. In a 2021 company memo to his staff, he freely confessed that he didn't possess the standard attributes of an effective manager. Zhang clarified he was more interested in understanding market trends and organizational theory than human beings. His isolationism has turned him into the embodiment of an outsider, and he only makes appearances publicly and engages in social functions with difficulty.Most of Zhang's fortune is derived from his holding in ByteDance, the proprietor of TikTok. Through 2024, ByteDance has grown to be a tech behemoth, touching every nook and cranny of the world. Even though Zhang is no longer running the day-to-day business of the company, he continues to shape ByteDance's destiny through his grasp of AI strategy.As of 2024, Zhang Yiming's net worth of $65.5 billion places him among the world's richest individuals. Although he has surpassed other Chinese billionaires such as Zhong Shanshan and Ma Huateng, Zhang's net worth is still behind the wealth of people such as Mukesh Ambani, Adani, and global tech tycoons such as Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates. Despite being fabulously wealthy, Zhang remains an introvert personality, working behind the scenes and continuing to shape the tech world.ByteDance has made heavy investments in AI research and development under Zhang, with the goal of attaining artificial general intelligence (AGI). The vision is to develop AI systems that are as good as or even better than human intelligence. ByteDance has aggressively poached the best AI talent, with Zhang himself backing generous compensation packages to lure top industry talent.Zhang has long aspired to make ByteDance as globally influential as Google. He has been optimistic and circumspect, in interviews, regarding the difficulty of spreading Chinese businesses overseas. The success of ByteDance with TikTok has already overcome most obstacles, however, enabling the company to access consumers around the world and redefine the digital media environment.
Article Summary: Zhang Yiming has joined the list of China's richest individuals according to Forbes, with an estimated net value of $65.5 billion. Zhang started in 2012 when he started ByteDance from a small four-bedroom apartment in Beijing. His vision was to use machine learning and big data to personalize content for users, revolutionizing the way people consume information.
